Cherkashina, Tatyana 
From: Cherkashina, Tatyana 
Sent: Tuesday, January 22, 2008 3:39 PM 
To: `supportbIogger.comT 
Subject: DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE www.bIogspot.com (66102.15.100) 
Importance: High 
PLESE NOTE THAT YOU HAVE ENABLED PLAYBOY TO EMAIL DMCA COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 
NOTICES! 
January 22, 2008 
URGENT! 
Via Fax (650) 963-3255 
Email supportbIogger.com 
Google, Inc. 
Attn: User Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 
Dear Sir or Madam: 
It has been brought to our attention that web pages at www.blogspot.com (66.102.15.100) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. (``Playboy''). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. 
I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on www.bloospot.com (66.102.15.100) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. 
Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on www.bloosDot.com (66.10215.100) and on all web pages under your control. 
Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: 
tflp://ravartlive.bloasoot.com/2007/i 2/pernilla-lundberg.html 
p://bD0.blooaer.com/_BUgKSwjCkaNRi pbCE8wpvl/AAAAAAAAB8o/c iiBnclyzE/sl 600-h/i 3.iDO 
http://bp2.blogger.com/ BUpKSwjCkaNR1 gbPk8wpvl/AAAAAAAAB84/S9-7MvuMD4Q/sl 600-h/i 9.ipg http://bp3.blociger.com/ BUpKSwjCkaA/R1 gbWo8wpzl/AAAAAAAAB9A/FFDxvdFKZUc/si 600-h/20.joc http://bolblopcier.com/ BUgKSwjCkaNRI pbLU8wpxl/AAAAAA.AAB8W/PTD7k0B4IX4/sl 600-h/i 6jpg jgp://bD2.blooper.com/ BUciKSwjCkaAIR1 QbHk8wDwl/AAAAAAAAB80/6nUkOSxCNME/si 600h/1 4.jpg ifltp://bDi .bJpier.com/ BUgKSwjCkaAIR1 ga6u8wpul/AAAAAAAAB8Y/DF5e-RNy1 eo/si 600-j/12.jpg 
I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., [redacted] Lakeshore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax [redacted], phone [redacted] E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com. 
We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. 
This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. 
PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTE TIONAL, INC.
